summary.purpose: Provides an in-memory singleton cache manager for storing and retrieving arrays and objects by key.
summary.problem_solved: Gives server-side code a simple, centralized in-memory key-value store (singleton) so that different parts of the application can share cached data without external dependencies.

external.purpose: Provides the TObject generic type used to type the internal data store

exports.name: CacheManager
exports.description_one_line: Singleton class that manages an in-memory key-value data store for arrays and objects

symbols.name: CacheManager
symbols.description_one_line: Singleton class providing in-memory key-value caching for arrays and objects

details.what_it_does: Implements the singleton pattern to provide a single shared in-memory cache. Stores data in a private object keyed by string identifiers. Supports storing and retrieving both arrays (with empty-array default) and arbitrary objects (with configurable default value).

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description_one_line: Returns the singleton CacheManager instance, creating it if it does not yet exist

methods.name: setArrayData
methods.description_one_line: Stores an array in the cache under the given key

methods.name: getArrayData
methods.description_one_line: Retrieves an array from the cache by key, returning an empty array if not found

methods.name: setObjectData
methods.description_one_line: Stores an arbitrary value in the cache under the given key

methods.name: getObjectData
methods.description_one_line: Retrieves a value from the cache by key, returning a default value (null) if not found

symbols.name: cache_manager
symbols.description_one_line: Pre-instantiated singleton instance of CacheManager, ready for direct import and use

details.what_it_does: Calls CacheManager.getInstance() at module load time to create and export the singleton instance. Consumers should import this variable directly rather than calling getInstance() themselves.
